companyDescription: Bansho is an EdTech startup building a TikTok-style mobile app delivering educational content for kids.
description: Delivered the Bansho iOS & Android app to App Store and Google Play in under six months
Architected and integrated APIs while managing GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines
Implemented state management (Redux) for scalable application logic
Used Fastlane and self-hosted runners to reduce build times
achievements: Launched educational app in under 6 months
